name: .EZC File Extension
summary: Learn about .EZC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Ecscad AutoCAD, a program used for designing electric circuits; saves a backup of library components, which contain symbols and circuit information used to build schematics; saved in a compressed .ZIP format.

content: AutoCAD Ecscad is localized in German.
NOTE: Autodesk AutoCAD Ecscad was discontinued in 2013.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
